1317240.name: Charge Knight: A Duck's Tale
1317240.description:
Halt, adventure lovers,
With limited movement comes great responsibilities!

What can you expect from an experienced knight, so used to cavalry charges, when he is separated from his steed and confined to small underground chambers? At least in this game the right answer is "hope he keeps doing what he's always done, even without the horse".

No matter the direction chosen for the movement, our rider never stops before encountering any obstacle. Unstoppable and armed with only one weapon, Dundee must be strategically guided through the dungeons, defeating enemies, collecting items, activating mechanisms and using the scenario in his favor.

How To Play!

The player takes control of Dundee, a stubborn rider who, even without his horse, believes that the best way to overcome obstacles is to throw himself at them with gun in hand at full speed.

The proposal is a simple and fun mechanic, plan your way through the scenario with the fewest moves possible, choose the direction in which you want to move and keep going until something stops you.

The moves are not limited but the fewer moves you make, the greater your achievements.


What to expect?
  • About 6 amazing hours of gameplay.
  • 55 Handmade levels.
  • Easy to understand for beginners, but still challenging and fun for experienced players.
  • Return to previous phases to optimize solutions.
  • Follow the momentum of combat or plan every move.

See you in the next adventure,
Dragon Lord Studio.
